column5: ADMA Congrats to those who held patient during offering and loaded up in the 4s If you like stocks that have Perspective Advisors sign of approval they are top investor in ALDX at current discount price of 741 with price target 28 Bullish LT on both
BHC i have seen ALDX being touted as a possible target for Bausch They currently trade at a sub 200m mkt cap and their lead product is currently at Phase 2 trials
